channel.title: 🏢 Arizona State University on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Arizona State University on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: From Generation to Judgment: Opportunities and Challenges of LLM-as-a-judge
item.description: LLMs are revolutionizing AI evaluation by offering nuanced judgments surpassing traditional methods. This paper provides a taxonomy, benchmark, and future directions for LLM-as-a-judge.
